short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get gifts from your favourite content creators by engaging with there content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MySocial360 is a chrome extension that enables content creators to communicate with their audience directly and engage with them outside social media by notifications triggered by user action.
